body_html:
Do you need openmpi? Openmpi is used for parallel training. If you don't need it, turn it off by passing -DUSE_MPI=OFF to the cmake command.

If you do want to use openmpi, can you try uninstalling it from brew and installing it from openmpi's website?
body_text:
Do you need openmpi? Openmpi is used for parallel training. If you don't need it, turn it off by passing -DUSE_MPI=OFF to the cmake command.
If you do want to use openmpi, can you try uninstalling it from brew and installing it from openmpi's website?
body:
Do you need openmpi? Openmpi is used for parallel training. If you don't need it, turn it off by passing -DUSE_MPI=OFF to the cmake command.

If you do want to use openmpi, can you try uninstalling it from brew and installing it from openmpi's website?
